text: LisaGay Hamilton (born March 25, 1964 in Los Angeles) is an American actress, movie director and producer. She has performed in movies, television shows and theater. She played Rebecca Washington in the ABC drama series The Practice and Sethe in the 1998 movie Beloved. She also had other performances on the stage. == References == Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:American movie actors Category:1964 births Category:Living people
title: LisaGay Hamilton
